name: DemoGuide
0:
”Alexa, open demo guide”
”Alexa, start demo guide”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: demo guide
des:
🔥🔥🔥🔥 This is a Revolutionary Voice First Guest Service that you can offer to your guests to INCREASE your PROFIT 🔥🔥🔥🔥

This is just a "Demo Guide Skill" we've made to show you how powerful and useful the voice technology is for your rental property. We can customize the skill-based on your vacation rental house needs. We'll make sure your guests receive an amazing and memorable experience while they are at your place :)
Voice & innovation credentials

 👑👑👑WHAT ARE THE BENEFITS? 👑👑👑

👍Here are a few...

✅ World first-class guest service.
✅ An unforgettable experience for the guest. 
✅ The social buzz which will drive more traffic to your rental
✅ Increase your booking and profitability💰💰💰
✅ High guest retention.
✅ It's a 100%, hands-free guest assistant. 
✅ Generate ✴️✴️✴️✴️✴️ five-star reviews every time you rent your place.
✅ This skill will eliminate all your time consuming and inefficient guest service.
✅ Guest Voice will handle the questions your guests might have before and during their stay at your place.
✅ This skill will enable you to spend more time on important things instead of dealing with your guest questions.
✅ Co-host guest communication solutions. 
 
💯💯💯Here how you can try out the Demo Guide💯💯💯

Simply ask "Alexa, open demo guide" after you heard the welcome message just pretend you are a guest and follow any of these questions below:

"Where is the TV remote?" or " Where can I find a TV remote?"
"Where is the coffee maker?" or "Where is coffee machine?"
"What is WiFi? or "What is the WiFi network name?"
"Where is toilet paper?"
"When is the checkout?"
"Have suggestions" 
"Where is the towel?"
"Where is the shampoo?"
"Where is some extra pillow?"
"Where is iron?"
"Where is the fire extinguisher?"
"Where is the First Aid Kit?"
"How to turn on the TV?"
"How does the dishwasher work?"
"What is my host phone number?"
"How to use this stove?"
"Where is a hairdryer?"
"Where can I get a ride?"
"House rules"
"Where is the closest restaurant around here?" or "Do you have any restaurant recommendations?"
"Where are the bars?"
"What is the best place to visit here?"
"Where is the closest grocery?"
________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
🕺🏻🕺🏻🕺🏻WE ARE HAPPY TO SHARE LATEST ENHANCEMENT 🎁🎁🎁
You can NOW deliver digital coupons to your guests and make them LOVE you even more. We will build this into your custom Alexa skill.

Would you like to TRY?🤔🤔🤔
You betcha,
OK! Here we go, simply ask "Alexa, open demo guide" after greeting just ask:
"What is the best pizza place around here? or Pizza recommendation"

Give it a TRY and let us know what you think.

❓❓❓FAQS❓❓❓
I DON'T HAVE A VOICE ASSISTANT! HOW CAN I TRY DEMO GUIDE?
If you don’t have a smart speaker, don’t worry! If you have a smartphone, you can always download Amazon Alexa via the AppStore. Simply follow the steps and say “Open Demo Guide”
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I REALLY LIKE THE IDEA AND I CAN SEE A HUGE BENEFIT, BUT I DON"T LIKE TO SHARE MY HOUSE INFORMATION ON PUBLIC?
No worries, the skill will be 100% private, only your guest will have access to it. 

There are SO MANY more questions and answer you can add to your skill. This is just the tip of the🧊🧊🧊 iceberg. 
If you like to FREE yourself from an inefficient and very costly guest assistant then this will be the best opportunity for your vacation rental.

💯💯💯We are guaranteed a memorable and outstanding experience to amaze your guests💯💯💯
You can learn more about how to start using this skill for your rental property by checking ➡️➡️➡️ www.GuestVoyce.com ⬅️⬅️⬅️

HAVE QUESTIONS?
📩📩📩 Email us at Hello@GuestVoyce.com
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
